name: Knock the Bloody Door Down (itch)
description:
It's hard to be a human in a world of vampires, isn't it?

Knock the Bloody Door Down is a solo-developed narrative adventure game in which you explore an underground society of vampires. Walk, jump, and climb your way through a side-scrolling pixel art environment.

NOTE: The game was designed with 1920x1080 displays in mind. If you have the ability to set your display to 1920x1080, then doing so will result in the optimal gameplay experience.

Q & A

Q: Hmm, a side-scroller with vampires. So it's kind of like Castlevania?

A: Good question! No.

Q: Why is it free?

A: Because maybe the real treasure was the fishing minigames we played along the way.

Q: Is the game good?

A: No, but don't let that stop you from enjoying it!
